group_1.textLeft: So here we go again this week!
Urara!

group_1.textRight: And Kurara's!

group_1.textLeft: We're broadcasting live from our usual recording@studio today!

group_1.textRight: I mean, just because it's a remote TV station@doesn't mean they've got any budget at all, right?

group_1.textLeft: See, it's nasty to fess up inside information out@of nowhere!
The staff held meetings late into the night even@as Witches abounded,
this broadcast is the fruit of our efforts, realized@on a shoestring budget!

group_1.textRight: There it is, the word "Witches"!
Somehow, Urara seems to be hooked on that@urban legend lately, huh?

group_1.textLeft: I'm not hooked or anything,@I actually got attacked, y'know!
And the people who saved me were called@Magical Girls!
They don't mind putting themselves in danger@and everything, if it's to save us.
I want you to support them when you see them,@'cause see, they're heroes hidden in everyday life!

group_1.textRight: Hmm, I've never seen them, and I don't think@I really believe in that.
I mean, I don't wanna be in that kind of danger@in the first place.

group_1.textLeft: I guess that's right, if you ask me.
Maybe you'll be happier if you don't meet@Magical Girls.

group_1.textRight: It's not like I'm in any danger, am I?

group_1.textLeft: Well, Magical Girls are all doomed to a cruel fate.
So give them your support, okay?

group_1.textRight: Aaand, that's all for Urara's Occult Corner!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, this is just the opening talk, y'know!@Don't make up some weird slot for me!
This broadcast...

group_1.textRight: The girl we rescued the other day, she's been@running a show on the internet.
They've been streaming the archives after@broadcasting on cable TV.
In terms of age, it seems that a lot of middle@and high school students often watch.

group_1.textLeft: Part of the challenge was finding a way to spread@the word about Magical Girls...

group_1.textRight: Thus, this is an unexpected helping hand.
I never anticipated that saving her life would have@such a positive effect as this.
Is this what you'd call fate, I wonder?@How incredible.
To be honest, I was really negative before I saw@this broadcast.
I've been feeling rather empty since I haven't been@able to spread the word about Magical Girls.
It felt as though in the end, I'd have to keep dealing@with feeling like I'm trapped by something, anyway.
But this fills me with courage. *Giggle*♪

group_1.textLeft: People of influence are spreading the word@about our existence.
Nothing could be more reassuring than this.

group_1.textRight: Before we even knew about it,@the word was already spreading.
Now we just need to figure out how to reveal@our true identity.

group_1.textLeft: By the way, when was the broadcast?

group_1.textRight: It ended just about an hour ago.@What we just saw is also an archived stream,
so I'm sure some people are only now getting@around to watching it.

group_1.textLeft: Then I'll keep my ear to the ground at school@tomorrow to see if there are any rumors.

group_1.textRight: I'll be sure to mention it to my clubmates, too.
That's right.

group_1.textCenter: (Both Himuro-dono and I are out of touch with the@world, so Sasha-dono is a great help.)
(Following trends seems like an important notion.)
(This is the area where the landslide was severe,@along with the avalanche...)

group_1.textRight: Kuroda...?
(Right, if I recall correctly, Kuroda is indeed@from this area...)

group_1.textLeft: What the hell is a man if he can't even protect@his mother...?
How come everyone else's dead, and I'm the only@one left alive...
If she's gone too, I might as damn well just...

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashWhite1]What the— What are you thinking?!

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashRed1][se:3001_chara_damage][chara:800501:effect_shake]Ugh, Miura, what are you doin'?

group_1.textRight: I can't just stand by and watch a guy hold a@kitchen knife to his own neck!

group_1.textLeft: GET OUT OF THE WAY!!

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashWhite2]So be it!

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashRed2][chara:800501:effect_shake][se:3001_chara_damage]Agh...

group_1.textRight: A Witch's kiss, is it...

group_1.textLeft: Thus, consider this a consultation.@Why don't the three of us give it a shot?
A movement to make the world aware of@the existence of Magical Girls.

group_1.textCenter: (Well, let's see what kind of reaction I get...)
